data.name: value
data.description: Sets the default value of the input.

data.name: helperText
data.description: Displays additional information below the input.

data.name: variant
data.description: Controls the input's visual style. Available options: "bordered", "flat".

data.name: floatingLabel
data.description: Enables a floating label effect. Automatically enabled for the "flat" variant unless explicitly disabled.

data.name: size
data.description: Defines the input size. Available options: "sm", "md", "lg", "xl".

data.name: rounded
data.description: Controls the border-radius of the input. Available options: "sm", "md", "lg", "xl", "full", "none".

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Defines the animation speed for transitions. Available options: "none", "slower", "slow", "normal", "fast", "faster".

data.name: labelClasses
data.description: Applies custom styles to the label.

data.name: wrapperClasses
data.description: Applies custom styles to the input wrapper.

data.name: reset
data.description: Resets all default styles and applies only custom styles.
